</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get marker direction. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''markerDir''' markerName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mPos = '''markerDir''' "markerOne"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
